short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gain insights into remote/hybrid productivity, website usage analysis, screenshot, monitor team performance with We360.ai Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock unparalleled productivity insights with the we360.ai Chrome extension! Effortlessly monitor work time right in your browser and gain valuable data to optimise your team's performance:

- Dive deep into website usage to understand work patterns and identify productivity trends.

- Stay on top of your team's activity in real-time, ensuring accountability and efficiency.

- Easily distinguish between productive and unproductive time, empowering you to streamline workflows.

- Enhance transparency with screenshot capture, offering visual proof of employee engagement.

- Achieve a balanced workload distribution and foster a more equitable work environment.

Elevate your productivity tracking and workforce management with the we360.ai Chrome extension. Install now and revolutionise your organisation's productivity strategy!
